site_name: Grosvenor House Grosvenor RoadTwickenhamTW1 4AD
description: Location: Frontage working anti clockwise around building1. Walnut Crown lift to 3m above ground level, clear Highway sign. Crown reduce by 2.5m, clean crown. (Existing height approx. 14m & spread approx. 14 m) 2. Juniper Reduce and reshape by up to 1.5m, clean crown. (Existing height approx. 10m & spread approx. 6 m) Side access to rear4. Cypress Remove dead stem & lightly shape remainder. 5. Atlas Cedar Remove dead branches. 6. Cypress (dead) Fell to ground level. Rear of Block 7. Bay Tree Reduce height by up to 1.5m and trim all around by a further 1.5m-2m increasing amount to 2.5m growing towards car port. (Existing height approx. 11m & spread approx. 8m) 8. Holly Prune back branches to clear building and car pot by 1m. 9. Cypress Significant die back throughout crown: Remove dead to live suitable growth and shape, as necessaryReason: safety & cyclical tree maintenance.
